bbelanger.domain

Class FizzBuzzChainHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • bbelanger.domain.FizzBuzzChainHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuzzChecker, FizzBuzzChecker, FizzChecker

    public abstract class FizzBuzzChainHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that is an implementation of the Chain of Responsibility design pattern.
    Author:
    Benny Belanger

      • checkValue

        protected abstract boolean checkValue(int valueToCheck)
        Checks if a given value agienst the inputed value
        Parameters:
        valueToCheck - value that will be checked
        Returns:
        true if the value passed all checks false if the value failed checks

      • setNextHandler

        public void setNextHandler(FizzBuzzChainHandler next)
        Sets the reference to the next Handler in the Chain
        Parameters:
        next - the next FizzBuzzChainHandler in the Chain of Responsibility

      • processValue

        public java.lang.String processValue(int valueToCheck)
        Processes the given value through the Chain until one member of the Chain successfully processes the value
        Parameters:
        valueToCheck - value that will be processed
        Returns:
        String result from the FizzBuzzChainHandler that succeeded. null if no part of the chain was successful
